Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute at  Grand/Laramie
ShortDescription: #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Laramie, Fullerton, Central, due to police activity near Grand/Laramie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Laramie, Fullerton, Central, then resume their normal route on Grand, due to police activity near Grand/Laramie.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Jackson/Damen
ShortDescription: Eastbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Damen, Madison, Ashland and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Jackson/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Damen, Madison, Ashland and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Jackson/Damen.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
